channel.title: Miscellaneous on John L. Godlee
channel.description: Recent content in Miscellaneous on John L. Godlee

item.title: Chickpea and carrot crepes
item.description: Ingredients 250 g chickpea flour 250 g grated carrots 350 ml oat milk 1 tsp caraway seeds (alternatively fennel, mustard, cumin, coriander seeds) Salt Black pepper 1 tsp olive oil Method Combine all ingredients except caraway seeds into a blender and blend until a thin smooth batter. Dry roast caraway seeds in a frying pan until fragrant then fold into the batter. Heat olive oil in drying pan, add a ladle of pancake batter to the pan and spread quickly to cover pan.

item.title: Chilaquiles
item.description: Ingredients 1 avocado, sliced 6 eggs 0.5 cup crumbled feta 1.5 cup tortilla chips 2.5 cups tomato salsa 1 lime 3 sprigs cilantro 1 tablespoon olive oil Method heat oil in pan Add salsa to pan and simmer for 10 minutes Add chips, and stir into salsa Add feta Crack eggs around edge of pan Cover pan and let sit for 10 minutes or until eggs have set Serve with a spatula, with lime juice, extra feta, avocado, coriander

item.title: Chocolate protein bar
item.description: Ingredients 350 g protein powder (chocolate flavor) 285 g oatflour 5 ml almond milk 100 g 70% chocolate 2 tsp of prepared espresso A little vanilla extract Optional extras Almonds Oats Berries Method Mix protein powder, oatflour. Mix in almond milk chocolate, espresso, vanilla extract. Put in container and press it out to the edges. Crumble chocolate to very small pieces, melt it using whatever method.

item.title: Coleslaw
item.description: Ingredients 0.5 cabbage, shredded 2 carrots, grated 4 spring onions, chopped 2 tbsp sultanas 3 tbsp mayonnaise 1 tbsp wholegrain mustard Method Put carrots, spring onions, sultanas in a large bowl and stir to combine In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, mustard Combine everything together and toss to mix

item.title: Falafel
item.description: Ingredients 250 g dried chickpeas 2 tsp coriander seeds 3 tsp ground cumin 1 tsp cumin seeds 2 garlic cloves Small bunch of parsley Small bunch of coriander 1 tsp baking powder Sunflower oil for frying 1 tsp salt Method Soak chickpeas in water for at least 12 hours Drain the chickpeas Pulse chickpeas in a food processor Toast the coriander seeds, ground cumin and cumin seeds in a small dry pan Finely chop garlic cloves Combine the spices, garlic, salt and chickpeas then blitz in food processor until they form cohesive balls Chill the mixture in the fridge for at least 30 minutes Form the mixture into ping-pong sized balls Heat oil in a shallow pan until nearly smoking and fry the falafels in batches.

item.title: Freezer vegan breakfast burritos
item.description: Ingredients Tortillas Green lentils, boiled and fry fried Refried beans Mushrooms Bell peppers Vegan cheese, shredded Spinach/lettuce Eggs Coriander Salt Paprika Paper towels Method In large pan, fry off peppers, mushrooms Add green lentils Whisk eggs and add to pan, combine Combine with rest of ingredients on tortilla Roll up and wrap in paper towel and freeze for up to a month

item.title: Hairy bittercress pesto
item.description: Ingredients 7-10 rosettes hairy bittercress 1 clove garlic 0.5 chilli 25 g grated cheese 10 walnut halves 10 g pine nuts 2 tbsp olive oil 0.5 lemon 0.5 tsp sugar Method Rinse the cress and roughly chop into a mixing bowl Heat garlic cloves for a few minutes on low heat to mellow the flavour Chop the garlic and chilli into the bowl Add all the other ingredients Blend with a stick blender

item.title: Lip Balm
item.description: Ingredients Shea butter 12.5g Beeswax 7.5g Cocoa butter 5g Almond and Calendula oil 15ml Method Melt shea butter, beeswax, cocoa butter in metal bowl over boiling pan When melted, add almond and calendula oil Mix well Pour into tins while hot

item.title: Tomato Ketchup
item.description: Ingredients 5 lbs fresh tomatoes, chopped small 0.25 tsp cayenne pepper 0.25 cup apple cider vinegar 1 tsp salt 2 tbsp molasses 2 tbsp honey 0.25 tsp ground clove 0.25 tsp ground cinnamon 1 tbsp brown or Dijon mustard 0.5 tsp Worcestershire sauce 0.25 tsp ground pepper 0.25 large onion, diced 0.5 clove garlic, minced Method Place tomatoes in large deep pan Gently mash tomatoes and cook for 30 minutes on low heat Puree tomatoes with stick blender Pour tomato puree into slow cooker Add remaining ingredients and cook on low overnight Puree mixture again Remove lid of slow cooker and cook on medium for ~ 3-4 hours Puree mixture again Funnel into sterilised jars

item.title: Wood Sealant
item.description: Ingredients 1 part beeswax 3 parts mineral oil Method Suspend bowl over simmering water Add beeswax and mineral oil Heat and stir until clear pour into jar and let cool
